patthana16.33:4.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.33:4.3: Hetuyā soḷasa, ārammaṇe dvādasa, adhipatiyā terasa … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe …
patthana16.33:5.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.33:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
